subject: Baseball
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: Yankee Stadium has never been a baseball-only place. It’s been home to football, soccer, rock ‘n’ roll, and Pope Benedict XVI is on deck for April 20.
snippet: Yankee Stadium has never been a baseball-only place. It’s been home to football, soccer, rock ‘n’ roll, and Pope Benedict XVI is on deck for April 20.
